name: Beef and Vegetable Stir-Fry
steps: Slice the beef thinly and sauté in a hot pan until browned.
Add sliced carrots and corn to the pan and stir-fry until tender.
Mix in a handful of peanuts for crunch.
Season with soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.
Serve over rice.

name: Thai Beef Salad
steps: Cook thinly sliced beef in a hot pan until cooked through.
Toss together shredded carrots, corn, and peanuts in a bowl.
Make a dressing with lime juice, fish sauce, sugar, and chili flakes.
Combine the beef with the vegetable mixture and dress with the tangy dressing.
Garnish with fresh herbs like cilantro and mint.

name: Beef and Peanut Noodle Stir-Fry
steps: Cook ground beef in a large skillet until browned.
Add diced carrots and corn to the skillet and cook until softened.
Mix in cooked noodles and chopped peanuts.
Drizzle with a sauce made from soy sauce, sesame oil, and peanut butter.
Stir until everything is well combined and serve hot.

name: Peanut-Crusted Beef Tenders
steps: Coat beef tenders with crushed peanuts and a bit of salt and pepper.
Sear the beef tenders in a hot pan until the peanuts are toasted and the beef is cooked to your liking.
In the meantime, sauté julienned carrots until slightly caramelized.
Serve the peanut-crusted beef tenders over the carrots and garnish with extra peanuts.

name: Corn and Beef Soup with Peanut Drizzle
steps: Cook ground beef in a large pot until browned.
Add in corn kernels, sliced carrots, and enough broth to cover the ingredients.
Simmer until the vegetables are tender and the flavors have melded.
Puree a handful of peanuts with some water to create a smooth drizzle.
Serve the soup hot with a dollop of the peanut drizzle on top.
